resources.string: Well Done! All tasks completed today.

New Features
- A shiny new homescreen widget allows you to see all of today\'s tasks at a glance

Improvements
- Archive now shows if a completed task was from today or how many times it has been repeated in the past
- Choose in preferences whether, when adding a task, the first letter entered should be automatically capitalized
- The add button now disappears once you\'re adding a task

Tweaks
- Updated design
- Slightly tweaked task corner radius

Bugfixes
- Fixed a bug where immediately closing the app after replaying a task would mean the task was not replayed

If you have any bug reports or feature requests, feel free to leave a review or post an issue on our GitHub repository.

Thanks for using Sunset!
